title: Pretzel Crisps Creamy Broccoli Slaw
directions: Combine all the ingredients (except Pretzel Crisps(R)) in a large mixing bowl. Refrigerate 10 minutes. Place a scoop of the broccoli slaw mixture on top of Pretzel Crisps(R) and enjoy.
ingredients: 1 (7.2 ounce) package Snack Factory Original Pretzel Crisps
